sentences.en: (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.cn: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.en: A dark cloud of bees comes swarming out of the hive.
sentences.cn: 黑压压的一大群蜜蜂从蜂巢中飞出来。

sentences.en: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

sentences.en: He looked young, dark and sharp-featured, with hollow cheeks.
sentences.cn: 他看起来很年轻，肤色黝黑，五官分明，双颊凹陷。

sentences.en: high-level decisions made in the dark.
sentences.cn: 高层决定是秘密地制定的

sentences.en: I managed to keep my parents in the dark about this.
sentences.cn: 我设法对父母瞒下了此事。

sentences.en: I'm scared of the dark. I'm a big chicken.
sentences.cn: 我怕黑，是个十足的胆小鬼。

sentences.en: In the dark my sense of hearing becomes so acute.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中我的听觉变得异常灵敏。

sentences.en: It gets dark (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.cn: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.en: It was pitch dark (= completely dark ) in the attic.
sentences.cn: 阁楼上漆黑一片。

sentences.en: It was still dark (= was night ) when we boarded the train.
sentences.cn: 我们上火车时天还是黑的。

sentences.en: Joanne had a small dark birthmark near her hairline.
sentences.cn: 乔安妮的发际线旁有个小小的深色胎记。

sentences.en: kept me in the dark about their plans.
sentences.cn: 我对他们的计划一无所知

sentences.en: my childish fear of the dark
sentences.cn: 我对黑暗孩子般的恐惧

sentences.en: Prudent people are not going to take a leap in the dark.
sentences.cn: 小心谨慎的人是不会轻易冒险的。

sentences.en: She kissed him and gazed into his dark, brooding eyes.
sentences.cn: 她吻了吻他，久久凝视着他乌黑忧郁的双眼。

sentences.en: She saw Ellis, soberly dressed in a well-cut dark suit.
sentences.cn: 她看见了埃利斯，他穿着一身裁剪合体的素净的黑西装。

sentences.en: Suddenly, the room went dark (= became dark ) .
sentences.cn: 房间突然变暗了。

sentences.en: The church was dark and quiet.
sentences.cn: 教堂里黑魆魆的，寂静无声。

sentences.en: the dark winter days
sentences.cn: 阴暗的冬日

sentences.en: The forest was dark and silent, haunted by shadows and unseen presences.
sentences.cn: 这个森林黑暗寂静，经常有幽灵和看不见的鬼怪出没。

sentences.en: The strong dark eyebrows give his face an oddly menacing look.
sentences.cn: 两道浓黑的眉毛使他的脸看起来异常凶狠。

sentences.en: There he stood: hair in wild tangles, dark stubble shadowing his chin.
sentences.cn: 他站在那儿，头发乱成一团，下巴上一片黑胡茬。

sentences.en: Very dark glossy lips look wrong with heavily made-up eyes.
sentences.cn: 涂有深色唇彩的嘴唇看上去和浓艳的眼妆不相称。

sentences.en: We stood outside in the pitch dark (= when there is no light at all ) .
sentences.cn: 我们站在黑漆漆的屋外。

sentences.en: With a nice dark colour, the wine is medium to full bodied.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒色泽深暗悦目，是中等浓郁至浓香型的。

words.tran_cn: 黑暗地；模糊地；阴郁地；秘密地

phrases.phrase: a shot (或 stab) in the dark

phrases.tran_cn: 黑暗时代（欧洲史上约为公元476-1000年）
黑马（出人意外获胜的赛马或参赛人）；（美）[政]“黑马”候选人（常因各方妥协而意外获得提名或当选）

phrases.phrase: the darkest hour is just before the dawn

trans.tran_cn: 黑暗的，深色的，神秘的，悲惨的，忧郁的，邪恶的
trans.tran_en: if it is dark, there is little or no light
when there is no light, especially because the sun has gone down
